name: D/Generation
description:
D/Generation was an acclaimed game on PC, Amiga and ST back in the 1990s. Developed from the original source code by the original Amiga & ST programmer, this app has the complete game beloved of many, the first level is free with the full game available with an InApp purchase.
For newcomers to the game, you are a delivery man tasked with delivering a package to a large corporation. Once there you discover the building has been taken over by biogen weapons and there are many people that need to be rescued. You take on the task of rescuing these people and discovering what went wrong.
Played over 10 levels of interconnecting rooms, this version is the basis for the new D/Generation HD that was released in Q4 2015 on PS4 and XBox One.

Supports MFi controllers.
